name: Space Blaster! (Volg Dool Dool)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project for Coursera. It is somehow hard, but I hope you will beat it. Enjoy!

Added design modifications:

  • Neutral/friendly mentor characters
  • Character dialog lines
  • New "restart level" function in "Game over" pop-up menu

Added visual modifications:

  • New border visuals
  • New asteroid visuals
  • Updated instructions

Added gameplay modifications:

  • New gameplay mechanic: protect the target
  • Deadly destructible asteroids
  • Tweaked enemies' and player's stats
  • Reduced player's lives to 1 (for more fun, obviously!)

KNOWN BUG: On Level 3, when enemies get killed by the environment ( e.g. due to collisions with asteroids) the victory condition script starts to freak out, which leads to the victory screen display too early. SOLUTION: try to kill all of the enemies with your spaceship.
